long_description: Built for mountain bikers seeking the edge in safety, the Scott Lin Bike Helmet uses the MIPS(R) safety system to enhance natural protection from impacts. MIPS technology boosts protection in cases of impact at an oblique angle; outer shell slides independent of liner, reducing rotational violence on the brain. Rotary Adjustment System with V-shaped Sides (V.R.A.S.) lets you fix helmet in 2 vertical positions to customize comfort. In-Mold technology binds the shell to the helmet's EPS liner, enhances impact-resistance and creates a lightweight helmet. Integrated polyamide frame provides extra strength and integrity to the helmet without increasing the weight substantially. Easily adjustable chin strap dividers provide maximum comfort and correct positioning of the helmet on your head during use. The Scott Lin Bike Helmet has 20 vents and a built-in visor.
